itunes:title: 258 - Exploit This Natural Law That Will Make 2020 YOUR Year
itunes:author: Andy J. Pizza
itunes:summary:
If you want to start 2020 with a plan that will supercharge your year with clarity and serious progress, start your year with this episode!!!

I have a tendency to rush into the next new thing and the NEW YEAR is no exception for me!

However, I’ve found that for my new year to have max potential, I need to do a thorough recap and review of the past year.

In this episode I will give you a lens to look over 3 aspects of your previous year that will give you hidden advantages for 2020 that you would have otherwise missed!
